item.title: Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot 2020 - Grande Vitae
item.description: The semi-dry Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot from the house of Grande Vitae shimmers with a bright purple red in the glass. In the glass, this red wine from Grande Vitae reveals aromas of black cherries, plums, blueberries, morello cherries and blackberries, complemented by other fruity nuances. The Grande Vitae Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot shows us an incredibly fruity taste on the palate, which is not without reason due to its residual sweet profile. On the palate, the texture of this balanced red wine presents itself wonderfully silky and velvety. Due to its concise fruit acid, the Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot shows itself exceptionally fresh and lively on the palate. In the finish, this youthful red wine from the wine-growing region of Apulia finally inspires with considerable length. There are again hints of blueberry and blackberry.
